regulatory_notes: All valuations based on UK GAAP FRS 102 principles
Asset useful lives determined by technology lifecycle and market conditions
BACA coin backing percentages represent allocation of asset value to cryptocurrency backing
Regular quarterly revaluations required for dynamic technology assets
Impairment testing conducted annually or when indicators present
Development costs capitalized where future economic benefits probable
